short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension used to search ECW patient by MRN.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "MRN" extension searches the Member in RDH based on eCW Patient ID
If the Patient ID is valid, respective Members Plan Details is fetched and displayed in the Extension
